data.title: Judith Godrèche Files Complaint Against Director Jacques Doillon for Alleged Rape
data.meta_description: Judith Godrèche, the French actor-turned-filmmaker who recently delivered the semi-autobiographical series “Icon of French Cinema,” has filed a complaint against director Jacques Doillon alleging rape, Variety has confirmed. Godrèche filed the complaint on Feb.
data.text: Judith Godrèche, the French actor-turned-filmmaker who recently delivered the semi-autobiographical series “Icon of French Cinema,” has filed a complaint against director Jacques Doillon alleging rape, Variety has confirmed. Godrèche filed the complaint on Feb. 6, the same day that she filed one against director Benoit Jacquot. Interviewed by the local radio station France Inter, Godrèche […]
